01.title: We are Nights of Sounds, who are you?
01.text: We are two guys from the southwest of Germany, we can't live without music and it's everything for us, and because we have done random stuff together, and our most random idea was to start with Youtube. We met for the first time on a Minecraft roleplay server at the beginning of the corona pandemic in 2020.

02.title: (Musical) Background
02.text: At the age of about 7 we came into contact with music by learning accordion and violin, these instruments are our main instruments, later we taught ourselves instruments like piano, guitar or bass. We were also a member of the school choir for a while, later we also came into contact with video and music production and were allowed to try synchronization as voice actors for various school projects.

03.title: Newest Upload
03.text: Here you have our newest upload on Youtube, if you want to help and support us for the next video, check out our Discord server.

04.title: Get in contact
04.text: If you want to get in contact with us, please go to our "Social Media Page" and choose one plattform. Please note, if you will write us a mail, there are spam filters activated and we can't guarantee that we will read it. | Typically we answer to contact requests in under one week. | If we will need help on our projects, we will do an announcement on Discord. If you able to use programs like "Unreal Engine 5", "Blender", "Krita" or similar, do not hesitate to contact us. This is the best support to improve our content and to support us with our work other than becoming a patreon.

user01.name: Hyouka
user01.text: 'The ones who accomplish true greatness, are the foolish who keep pressing onward. The ones who accomplish nothing, are the wise who know when to quit' || 'Listen close, Listen well, For I have a story to tell, It begins not here, but two steps from hell'

user02.name: Jareix
user02.text: 'Anything that can go wrong will go wrong.' | 'Spread that love' | 'My high hopes are getting low But I know I'll never be alone It's alright, we'll survive 'Cause parents ain't always right' | 'I'm trapped outside, inside my mind'

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.text: Here we will upload our songs, covers and more.

discord.name: Discord
discord.text: Join our community, be part of our vidoes, or just chill with us.

instagram.name: Instagram
instagram.text: We also do trash content here, sometimes YouTube is just not the perfect plattform for things like this.

patreon.name: Patreon

github.text: Because we're also programmers, you can find some projects over there.

thomann.name: Thomann
thomann.text: Our main source of music equipment.

amazon.name: Amazon
amazon.text: Our main source of random stuff.

rodent1a.name: Rode NT1-A
rodent1a.text: It has a very neutral sound.

shuresm7b.name: Shure SM7B
shuresm7b.text: It has a very warm sound.

tbonelucan.name: the t.bone Lucan System
tbonelucan.text: Without these, the instruments wouldn't sound very good.

rodem5mp.name: Rode M5 MP
rodem5mp.text: Perfect for instruments, where the Lucan System doesn't fit.

tbonemb7beta.name: the t.bone MB7 Beta
tbonemb7beta.text: Our old alternative for the Shure SM7B.

steinbergur22c.name: Steinberg UR22C
steinbergur22c.text: And if one mic is not enough, just use this.

presonustemblort10.name: Presonus Temblor T10
presonustemblort10.text: What would be music without bass?

davinciresolve.name: DaVinci Resolve
davinciresolve.text: Cutting videos is also important for us.

blender.name: Blender
blender.text: Well, you don't know about Blender? You really missed something.

unrealengine5.name: Unreal Engine 5
unrealengine5.text: If you hoped we also make games, sorry, we only use it for realistic videos.

soundpc.name: Sound Computer
soundpc.text: The computer on which all the sound you hear in our videos is made.[MSI B550 Gaming Plus,, AMD Ryzen 7 3700x,, 16GB RAM,, NVIDIA RTX 3060TI]

cuttingpc.name: Cutting Computer
cuttingpc.text: The computer used for making our videos.[MSI B550 Gaming Plus,, AMD Ryzen 7 3700x,, 32GB RAM,, AMD RX 5500xt]

ukulele.name: Ukulele
ukulele.text: Will there be a Hawaii song? We don't know.

aguitar.name: A-Guitar
aguitar.text: The cleanest sound is only possible with accoustic instruments.

eguitar.name: E-Guitar
eguitar.text: The equivalent to acoustic, but more electric.

ebass.name: E-Bass
ebass.text: A good bassline is everything for a good songs.

violin.name: Violin
violin.text: Difficult to learn, but it's worth.

eviolin.name: E-Violin
eviolin.text: The equivalent to acoustic, but more electric.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.text: We do not collect any personal data, all links used on the site are affiliate links, these lead to third-party providers, we do not receive any personal data from them either, and we assume no liability for data misuse.| This page is only there to provide information about us and our work.|Our web pages and their contents are subject to German copyright law. Unless expressly permitted by law, every form of utilizing, reproducing or processing works subject to copyright protection on our web pages requires the prior consent of the respective owner of the rights. Individual reproductions of a work are only allowed for private use. The materials from these pages are copyrighted and any unauthorized use may violate copyright laws.

404.text: We are so sorry 😭 | We searched everywhere, but could not find the website you requested. Please make sure, the url you typed in is correct.
